author: CBC News
title: Afghan refugees, international students stranded in Ukraine as Russia attacks | CBC Radio
description: Afghan refugee Jawed Ahmad Haqmal and his family fled one war zone only to find themselves stranded in another. Arpit Katiyar, a second-year medical student from India, has been hunkered in an underground metro station since Friday with no way of getting home.
content:
Jawed Ahmad Haqmal and his family fled one war zone only to find themselves stranded in another.
